titles.title: Recognizing, on the occasion of the 52nd annual meeting of the Canada-United States Inter-Parliamentary Group in September, 2011 in St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada, the immeasurable assistance Gander International Airport, the Government of Canada, and the citizens of Gander, Newfoundland and Labrador, provided to the United States immediately following the terrorist attacks on the United States on September 11, 2001.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Western Hemisphere.

bill.summary: 5/31/2011--Introduced. Recognizes and thanks the citizens of Gander, Newfoundland, and all other citizens across Canada who, during a time of unprecedented crisis, challenge, and uncertainty, came to the aid of U.S. citizens and cemented the generosity, goodwill, and mutual understanding that has defined the relationship between the United States and Canada.
